data.comment: The match is underway in Madrid.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 1, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atletico's Luis Suarez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
In the minute 3, Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yannick Carrasco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico.
Getafe's Angel Rodriguez breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico are on the attack at Wanda Metropolitano, where Thomas Lemar is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 18, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Atletico.
Luis Suarez scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Yannick Carrasco with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Atletico.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 24, Angel Rodriguez for Getafe has been booked by Jesus Gil Manzano and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico are pushing forward but Luis Suarez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Getafe have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Stefan Savic (Atletico) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Atletico a goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Free kick Getafe.
Angel Rodriguez (Getafe) strikes at Wanda Metropolitano but his header is cleared.
In the minute 36, Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Getafe are coming forward and Xabier Etxeita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 37, Play has been interrupted briefly in Madrid to check on Angel Rodriguez, who is grimacing with pain.
Angel Rodriguez for Getafe is back on the field again.
Goal kick for Getafe at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 41, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Atletico's half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Getafe will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico.
Atletico push forward at Wanda Metropolitano and Luis Suarez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Getafe defence.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 49, Atletico drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 55, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Atletico's half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Madrid.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Atletico's area.
Diego Simeone is making the team's first substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Saul Niguez replacing Sime Vrsaljko.
Getafe push forward at Wanda Metropolitano and Jaime Mata gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Atletico defence.
In the minute 59, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yannick Carrasco for Atletico drives towards goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Getafe throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 60, Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
In Madrid Getafe attack through Jaime Mata. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Getafe's Juan Antonio Iglesias Sanchez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 64, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Atletico a goal kick.
Marc Cucurella (Getafe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 69, Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a first substitution, with Enes Ünal replacing Jaime Mata.
Getafe's David Timor misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
Lucas Torreira is replacing Thomas Lemar for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico make their third substitution with Angel Correa replacing Joao Felix.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
Getafe needs to be cautious. Atletico have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Atletico to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Throw-in Getafe.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 75, At Wanda Metropolitano, David Timor has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Luis Suarez with Jose Gimenez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
In the minute 81, Atletico have a dangerous throw-in.
In Madrid, Atletico push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In the minute 82, Free kick Getafe.
Xabier Etxeita (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 84, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Atletico throw-in in Getafe's half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Getafe.
Jose Gimenez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 85, Can Getafe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Enes Ünal of Getafe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
The away team replace David Timor with John Joe Patrick Finn.
In the minute 89, Getafe's Marc Cucurella is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jesus Gil Manzano will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Getafe.
Can Atletico capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Getafe's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Getafe's area.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
